name: Retro Minigolf [Demo]
description:
Super early demo for a minigolf project Ive been working on. Uploaded to, well, have something uploaded :)

____________________________________________________________________________

[Controls]

[Mouse] click and hold to aim, release to shoot
[Q/E] rotate camera
[R/F] zoom camera

[Additional Credits]

[Font] fibberish, via https://caffinate.itch.io/fibberish
